ValidationRule.description: If the total order value is less than 0, the original order field must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Total_Order_Value__c<0, OR( ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(Approval_Status__c)), ISBLANK( Original_Invoice_Netsuite_ID__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The original order field is required for credit memos.
